# Nitric Oxide

Nitric oxide is an endothelium-derived pulmonary arterial vasodilator.


:::column-margin
NO has a wide variety of physiological roles, but clinically sees application only as a pulmonary vasodilator.
:::

## Indications

Two broad use-cases exist:

* RV failure and pulmonary hypertension
* Hypoxia\
